summary: create a new promotion flexi combo
description: create a new promotion flexi combo

query.name: order_numbers
query.description: orders numbers that can use flexi combo

query.name: discount_type
query.description: money | discount | freeGift | freeSample | discountWithGift | moneyWithGift | discountWithSample | moneyWithSample

query.name: stackable
query.description: Stackable DiscountEx. Buy 2SGD Save 1SGD, Buy 4SGD Save 2SGD, Buy 6SGD Save 3SGD, etc.

query.name: gift_buy_limit_value
query.description: buyer can choose gift/sample quantity limit value list

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/promotion/flexicombo/create')
request.add_api_parameter("apply", "ENTIRE_STORE")
request.add_api_parameter("sample_skus", "[{\"productId\":\"442156001\",\"skuId\":\"1174240001\"}]")
request.add_api_parameter("criteria_type", "AMOUNT")
request.add_api_parameter("criteria_value", "[\"100\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("order_numbers", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("name", "test")
request.add_api_parameter("platform_channel", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("gift_skus", "[{\"productId\":\"442156001\",\"skuId\":\"1174240001\"}]")
request.add_api_parameter("start_time", "1591977600000")
request.add_api_parameter("discount_type", "money")
request.add_api_parameter("end_time", "1592063999000")
request.add_api_parameter("discount_value", "[\"100\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("stackable", "false")
request.add_api_parameter("gift_buy_limit_value", "[\"1\"]")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/promotion/flexicombo/create')
request.add_api_param('apply', 'ENTIRE_STORE')
request.add_api_param('sample_skus', '[{\"productId\":\"442156001\",\"skuId\":\"1174240001\"}]')
request.add_api_param('criteria_type', 'AMOUNT')
request.add_api_param('criteria_value', '[\"100\"]')
request.add_api_param('order_numbers', '100')
request.add_api_param('name', 'test')
request.add_api_param('platform_channel', '1')
request.add_api_param('gift_skus', '[{\"productId\":\"442156001\",\"skuId\":\"1174240001\"}]')
request.add_api_param('start_time', '1591977600000')
request.add_api_param('discount_type', 'money')
request.add_api_param('end_time', '1592063999000')
request.add_api_param('discount_value', '[\"100\"]')
request.add_api_param('stackable', 'false')
request.add_api_param('gift_buy_limit_value', '[\"1\"]')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
